content:
Temporary text: With more Residents, the demand for food is increasing. Mobai wonders if they should open a planetary restaurant?
The player has taken good care of the planet, so Mobai will entrust the responsibility of looking after the Residents' daily meals to the player, the planet's owner.
info: 我来办聚餐-莫白_主流程文本

content: Temp text: Mobai hands over the restaurant blueprints to the player, explains how to use them, and suggests hosting a meal for the Residents.
info: 我来办聚餐-莫白_主流程文本
